title: Spice Management System
summary: An automated spice retrieval system integrating a motorised turntable controlled by an Arduino Nano 33 IoT and a Raspberry Pi GUI. Added voice commands and an Android app for remote monitoring. Provided 3D‑printed parts.

title: SplashKit Enhancements
summary: Contributed to the SplashKit SDK by developing a remote‑control module for Raspberry Pi GPIO pins, writing tutorials for beginners, and fixing bugs in the transpilation tool, including enumeration handling and Docker migration.

title: Computer Vision Object Detection Robot
summary: Built a vision‑based robot that plays with cats using object detection. Integrated robotics and AI to detect and interact with moving objects for pet enrichment.

title: Feline Feeding Habits Monitoring
summary: Designed a weight‑based feeding station to monitor and control cats’ feeding habits, collecting data to promote healthy eating patterns.
